snippet.title: (UPDATED) Dance Dance Revolution PC - Download Link!
snippet.description:
A rare Dance Dance Revolution version for Windows. uses an Internet Ranking feature. It has since been taken down. 48 characters are available in the game. 8 characters are unlockable in the game and 24 characters were added as free DLC. Same as the Internet Ranking feature, the DLC characters has been taken down. So you can only play with the basics character plus 8 unlockables ones. It comes with a total of 40 songs (not unlockables)

Chun-Link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1UEi3uzh2nBw3WCl_kpB-sFwBDs7Ebfbg/view?usp=sharing
